workshoptitle: Manage Java Runtimes, Applications and Managed Instances Inventory with Java Management Service

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set up Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Java Management Service
Lab 4: Understand Concepts related to Management Agent installation
Lab 5: Install Management Agent on non-OCI hosts - Linux
Lab 6: Install Management Agent on non-OCI hosts - Windows
Lab 7: Install Management Agent on OCI computes - Oracle Cloud Agent (OCA)
Lab 8: Set up multiple Managed Instances and Management Gateway
Lab 9: Track Java Usage in a Container
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
